content.rendered:
The demand for a well-trained workforce in the health care field continues to grow. If you’re looking to start your career or earn a certification, or are looking to transition into another specialization, we can help. If you’re already in the health care field and are in need of professional development, you can upgrade skills for career advancement or certification requirements.

In partnership with CareerStep, the University of La Verne now offers  programs geared for individuals that have a goal to become a Dental Assistant, Medical Assistant, Medical Records Specialist, Patient Care Technician, and Phlebotomy Technician. Many of the programs offer a clinical externship where you will work side-by-side with professionals in the industry you’ve chosen to study. You help real patients with their individual needs, just as you would once employed.

Dental Assistant

Prepare for certification and kickstart a new career as a dental assistant.

Medical Assistant

Start your career journey in one of the best, most popular healthcare support jobs.

Medical Records Specialist

Learn the non-negotiable skills all medical records specialists and health information technicians need to stand out in a competitive job market.

Patient Care Technician

Provide general care and comfort for patients in one of the fastest-growing roles in healthcare.

Register

To register for one of the programs at the University of La Verne, in partnership with CareerStep, complete the following steps:

  • Visit the University of La Verne CareerStep Portal page.
  • Click on the program of interest
  • Provide your contact information and then click the GET STARTED button
  • The customer service agent will reach out to you with details, or you can contact the customer service center directly at (877) 225-7151.

Once contact is made, you can begin our simple registration process and begin the program!
